executive_summary: Figures have been adjusted for inflation and are presented in 2024 currency. Poke shops have successfully capitalized on the rising health consciousness of younger individuals. The minimal cooking associated with poke bowls is well-accepted by many wellness enthusiasts who try to avoid fats, oil and additives in daily meals. The high substitutability of ingredients in poke bowls also appeals to paleo and keto diet practitioners. In general, the Poke Shops industry revenue has expanded an annualized 4.9% to $2.0 billion over the five years to 2024. Poke shops have endured economic hardships in 2020 when COVID-19 hit. However, the affordability and convenience of poke bowls have somewhat mitigated revenue losses. After the pandemic subsides, demand has recovered as most of the population has returned to work. As favored by time-strapped working individuals, falling unemployment has boded well with industry growth. Nonetheless, rising inflation since 2022 has weighed on demand for poke as many individuals cut back on meals away from home. Simultaneously, rising food prices have pressured industry profit. Continued interest in healthy food will continue to support demand for poke shops. Younger individuals are placing higher emphasis on their health, especially food. As poke shops introduce more varieties of toppings, such as nuts and grains, demand for poke will benefit accordingly. Overall, industry revenue is expected to rise 1.6% to $2.1 billion over the five years to 2029.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: POKE HAS GROWN FROM ITS TRADITIONAL FORM
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Poke bowl originated in Hawaii, where the dish was composed of chunks of raw fish marinated with condiments such as seaweed and candlenuts. The dish gained popularity in the mainland due to its convenience, nutrient-rich, healthy and swappable ingredients, Instagram-friendly looks and affordable prices.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: INCREASING HEALTH AWARENESS BODED WELL FOR INDUSTRY GROWTH
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As more individuals become concerned about their daily intake, their demand for healthy meals increases accordingly. Poke can be made to order, which enables customers to choose whichever ingredients they prefer. Consequently, poke also suits vegan and vegetarian customers who can pick tofu as their protein source instead of seafood.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Poke Bowls Appeal to Health Enthusiasts
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The industry has benefited from consistent growth in wellness enthusiasts adopting a clean-eating diet. These individuals focus on the nutrition and the quality of ingredients over the quantity, supporting demand for poke bowls. The customization ability of poke bowls also makes them appealing to many health enthusiasts who follow paleo and keto diets. These individuals can swap rice for salad as a base for their bowls, reducing the consumption of carbs.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Many Poke Shops Adopt the Franchise Models
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: According to Eater, Google searches for "poke bowls" increased 355.0% between the summer of 2015 and 2016, illustrating the increasing popularity of poke. Likewise, the Hollywood Reporter reported that the number of poke locations in Los Angeles grew from 12 in 2015 to more than 200 in 2017. Some operators have exited the industry, stating that the business was not profitable enough for them to stay, and the competition has intensified over the past five years. For instance, Chicago-based FinFin Poke and New York-based Sweetcatch Poke permanently left the industry. Therefore, more industry operators are joining the industry as franchisees to minimize the risks of establishing a new brand name.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: POKE IS EXPECTED TO BE THE NEXT FAST-CASUAL TREND
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The Poke Shops industry has emerged from the economic hardships in 2020. Industry players are expected to expand their operations to capitalize on revenue growth. The convenience and affordability of poke bowls make it ideal for poke shops to follow the fast-casual model. As individuals become more time-strapped as they have full-time employment, many have sought a nutritious and fast meal like a poke bowl.

industry_definition: Operators in this industry sell poke, typically including raw fish, cooked fish or other protein over rice with vegetables.

opportunities: High Performance Drivers - Per capita disposable income

key_trends: Due to its affordability and convenience, poke bowls have grown in popularity over the years. Further, many shops have followed the fast-casual model, capitalizing on the growing demand from time-strapped individuals. As inflation rises, more customers will restrict spending on food outside the home, pressuring industry demand. Nonetheless, rising health consciousness among younger individuals will counteract this decline. Profit has suffered from rising food costs. Inflation has pushed up all costs, including poke ingredients. The purchase represents the industry's largest costs. Delivery of ingredients must be prompt and reliable to avoid spoilage. Many poke shops have diversified product offerings to increase revenue. Besides poke, many shops now sell salads and soups. Poke shops have garnered interest from health enthusiasts. The low content of unhealthy ingredients in poke bowls has sparked demand from health-conscious individuals.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Higher income levels allow individuals to spend more generously on outside food, such as poke bowls. High-income earners are typically employed full-time, causing them to be time-strapped. Therefore, this has further increased demand for poke bowls.

products_and_services.product_description: Takeout and delivery services have surged substantially over the past five years, especially during COVID-19. Technology enhancements such as food ordering apps have boded well with the growth of these services.

Many customers sit down at poke shops during lunch hours. Poke shops are usually located in business district areas or town centers where offices concentrate, increasing revenue generated from sit-down sales.
Beverages are necessary when dining. Therefore, many poke shops sell complementary beverages such as juices and smoothies. Many shops also retail soups and other snacks.

tier_2_suppliers: Fish & Seafood Aquaculture in the US
Restaurant & Hotel Equipment Wholesaling in the US
Fruit & Vegetable Wholesaling in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Per capita disposable income determines an individual's ability to purchase discretionary goods and services. When per capita disposable income declines, consumers limit purchases to essential items and refrain from eating out. Rising per capita disposable income will represent a potential opportunity for the industry.

Health enthusiasts place higher emphasis on healthier and nutritious aspects of poke bowls while also demanding reasonably priced, convenient meals. The low sugar, preservatives and oil content of poke bowls have appealed to many customers.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Purchase costs include expenses on all products purchased from manufacturers, wholesalers and distributors. As industry operators serve raw fish such as tuna and salmon, these ingredients are expensive and must be well-kept to avoid spoilage.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: Poke restaurants have beefed up spending on mobile applications as consumers increasingly order food via phones.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Demand for poke is generally higher in warmer seasons. As poke is not served hot, demand for poke typically lowers during colder months. The supply of raw seafood and vegetables could also be affected by weather factors such as droughts or floods. Any fluctuation in the supply of main ingredients will directly affect industry revenue and profitability.

FAQs.question: What is the document about?
FAQs.answer: The document contains industry data in the form of a table with columns for year, revenue, enterprises, establishments, employment, wages, IVA, imports, and exports.

FAQs.question: What data is included in the table?
FAQs.answer: The table includes data on revenue (in $ million), number of enterprises and establishments, employment (in units), wages (in $ million), IVA (in $ million) for the years 2010 to 2020. Data on imports and exports is missing.

FAQs.question: What is the highest revenue value in the table?
FAQs.answer: The highest revenue value in the table is $1,548 million in 2019.

FAQs.question: What is the highest number of establishments in the table?
FAQs.answer: The highest number of establishments in the table is 1,816 in 2019 and 2018.

FAQs.question: What is the highest employment value in the table?
FAQs.answer: The highest employment value in the table is 1,135 in 2019.
